{{ categorie.nomination | uppercase}}
import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Categorie } from '../models/categorie.model'; import { CategoriesService } from '../services/categories.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-categorie', templateUrl: './categorie.component.html', styleUrls: ['./categorie.component.scss'] }) export class CategorieComponent implements OnInit { @Input() categorie!: Categorie; constructor(private categoriesService: CategoriesService, private route: ActivatedRoute){} ngOnInit(){ const categorieId = +this.route.snapshot.params['id']; this.categorie = this.categoriesService.getCategorieById(categorieId) } onViewProduits(){ } }
